I had wonderful experience this evening, 22 June 2017, with McDelivery. I placed my order at 1849hrs for 2 happy meals (8 pieces of nuggets, 2 small fries & 2 packet of Ribena), a Mc chicken meal (burger plain, medium fries & medium sprites w/o ice), 1 banana pie & 6 pieces of minions potatoes, estimated arrival time is 2125hrs.  Our economy is picking up, Mc Donald business is SOOO GOOD that they need to take 156 mins to prepare 3 sets of meals, 1 banana pie & 6 minions potatoes.  Has Hari Raya been brought forward???? Or today is weekend????  Thank you so much to e customer service officer, Nur Diya Nah, she was so helpful in executing my slimming program.

Hello McDonalds, 
I went to 2 McDonald's places tonight and neither of them knew what this minion food promotion was. Only advertise these things if they're available to Australia, as this is the AUSTRALIAN McDonald's page. I was highly disappointed to waste petrol, with high hopes to get a banana cone and minion potatoes and finding out they don't even exist.

Hi McDonald - I went to your five dock store in SYDNEY and asked to order some minions potato and banana pie and the guy at the speaker did not even know what I was saying! I had to repeat myself three times and he still did not know! This is unexceptable in a big CAPITAL city like SYDNEY - it's not fair! Why shouldn't we get what everyone else does! Please don't advertise things if you aren't going to give them to us!

My wife & I was looking forward to try the banana cone last night when we visited The Metropolis branch. When we recieve the ice cream, it was served with a normal cone instead of a blue cone. When we look around later, we saw some customer got the blue cone & some got normal cone. After futher observation, we realised the male manager who manned the cashier (who also served us) uses the normal cone & the his staff uses the blue cone. I personally think that your products should follow to the displayed picture you publicise.

comments.message:
19/05/2017  McDonald's HFC

Your intention is good for Hiring, but your advertisement on "HIRING" is seriously in need of elaboration of detail, before in the end it lead to confusing and frustration. Your strategy on Hiring is a total disaster. Why i said this?

Example: what will be the hour of your permanently day shift and night shift. What will the range of wages be for both shift Examples:
$500 - $1000 dollar will be day shift & $1400 - $2000 dollar will be your night shift. All this information must be stated to your advertisement first. at the very least you give your applicant a rough ideal as in how much budget your company can stretch.    

As advertise on your poster " speak to any of our Restaurant General Manager at our restaurant".

This is the First Issues:

I spoken to your Store manager in charge in Harbourfront a Filipino Female, she fixed a appointment with me at 4.00pm, I reached at 3.55pm. I understood that she is busy, but at least make a effort to inform her colleagues. 

"That i am still in need to waited for her for a while more" instead of me at 4.10pm going to the counter to informed her colleagues that i am still waiting for her to interviewed me. and your (Assistant Manager) although they informed her.

But They did not get back to me immediately instead they chat-chit a while and i need to asked one of your Assistant manager what is the "situation" his response was continuous to waited and finally at 4.17pm your Store Manager came to interviewed me.       

I understood a applicant need to waited,"BUT THIS IS NOT THE WAY TO TREATED A APPLICANT".

This is the Second Issues:

The interview don't last for 10-15 min instead last only for 3min:

Your Store Manager never had a formal document on Company Benefit and Company career advancement to shown me.

Your Store manager: hmmm, you requested for morning at $1xxxx.
but we only have package of morning of $1400-$1500. Additional regular attendant bonus and punctual of $100. Night a bit more.

Your Store Manager: so are you ok with O.J.T. me ok.

Me: hmmm,ok.

Your Store Manager: so you want the job?

Me:NO and left the store.

The issues lie here ,Never asked the applicant for more question.

Example: Are willing to works as McCafé® Barista, Restaurant Management Trainee, Other then Service Crew? As your addition role or task and so we can Negotiate or adjusted your wages from there?

My Concern are: Don't see "WHAT SHIFT THEY DO"
INSTEAD SEE HOW MUCH EFFORT AND TASK THEY DO TO PROMOTE McDonald's Brand.

My Second Concern: Some people are really not good at Recruiting people.
You should employed a Experience Human Resource to do the Job or have a HR to be at that place of that person whom is conducting interview? 

Your shift start from morning 5AM-6AM(for prep)6am-2pm all this require a lot of energy and Alertness and is equally same as night shift.

If you want a early start of the day "PLEASE JOIN THE SINGAPORE HAWKER CENTRE. They Start @ 5AM AND EMPLOYED THEM. 

Not Sincere Then Don't Employed.  

Your Poster advertise "Earn $2000" and i requested for a wages of below $2000
Mcdonalds, you basically created this page to apologise. Every time i go to your pages, its about you not being able to deliver......

Food ordered at 21:45 but at 23:48 and not delivered. Branch did not know food wasn't delivered until I called and directed to many place to finally get a "Madam can I send the food over to you now?" If it can't be fulfilled, then do not accept any orders. Or if under staff, lead the team properly.

And yes, like other comments my feedback here will be ignored.

Dear Mcdonald's, I would like to thank your team in the Tampines West branch for their great service. I made a special order through Mcdelivery, and the orders came correctly and in time. I'm very satisfied with the service from this outlet, have ordered a few times and they really take note of the special orders. I would like to say Good Job to the Tampines West CC Branch. :)

Mac Surprise Alarm is the only reason we visit McDonald's for the past 3 years.

Thanks for ending it and bringings normality back to our lives.

Will avoid McDonald's from now on. Thank you! :D

14.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 17 May 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.
